description: Triangle T(n,k) = number of labeled graphs of even degree with n nodes and k edges (n >= 0, 0<=k<=n(n-1)/2).
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 13, (1.4.7).
mathematica: w[p_] := 2^-p*(1+x)^(p*(p-1)/2)*Sum[Binomial[p, n]*((1-x)/(1+x))^(n*(p-n)), {n, 0, p}]; T[n_, k_] := SeriesCoefficient[w[n], {x, 0, k}]; T[0, 0] = T[1, 0] = 1; T[1, 1] = 0; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 8}, {k, 0, If[n<3, n, n(n-1)/2]}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 12 2015, translated from Maple *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 07 2001
